note:
EN: Digital Marketing & Innovation Consultant, and Public Speaker.
I love to read, learn, and discover new tools & technologies. After many years in Silicon Valley, I now live in the Italian Alps, my ideal MTB and trail-running place!

IT: Consulente e Public Speaker per Digital Marketing e Innovazione.
Ho una laurea in informatica. Mi piace leggere, scoprire e testare nuove tecnologie. Dopo 20+ anni in Silicon Valley, vivo in Valtellina, luogo ideale per MTB e trail running.
